Package infpp.streetlife.view

the streetlife-view commands everything revolving the human-computer-interaction such as gui/views and event-handling. Ships with some custom swing-components needed
Author:
Cornelius, Bastian
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    View  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloseDialog
    The CloseDialog is a custom PopUp window that asks the user, if he/she really wants to close the application.
    ComboBoxRenderer
    ComboBoxRenderer are a custom CellRenderer for JComboBoxes used for StreetObjects.
    ErrorDialog
    The ErrorDialog is a custom PopUp window that notifies the user after encountering an error.
    HelpDialog
    The HelpDialog is a custom PopUp window that tells the user some "helpful" information.
    StartUpDialog
    The StartUpDialog is the first thing the user interacts with.
    StreetGUI
    The StreetGUI represents the graphical interface of the street with the display area, control buttons, menu bar etc.
    StreetLifeView
    The StreetLifeView implements the interface, manages the in/outputs and controls the gui.
    TexturePanel
    Class TexturePanel to create a custom swing JPanel for displaying resizable pictures.
    TextView
    Simple text display on the system console, could be used for debug if gui gets bricked
